title: Coraetor
team: Jaehong Kim, Junbeom Shin, Myeongseong Kim, Takyeon Lee
summary: An aquarium product to provide air, lighting and shelter for aqua pets.
The name Coraetor is a combination of 'coral' and 'aerator',
symbolizing the shape inspired by coral that acts as an oxygen supply in the sea.

paragraph: An aquarium product to provide air, lighting and shelter for aqua pets.

The course project from [Design Project - Spring 2021, instructor: Prof. Takyeon Lee]
